data.text:
The WBAF Global Women Leaders Committee (GWLC) Incubator & Accelerator Partnerships Subcommittee is actively seeking strategic partnerships with incubators and accelerators around the world. Together, we can empower female-led startups by building a global network dedicated to their success. ðŸš€ Join our mission to foster innovation, drive economic growth, and promote gender equality in the entrepreneurial ecosystem. There are many hardworking people advancing and creating space for entrepreneurship globally. I have the privilege of being part of the WBAF family and have so many people to acknowledge. Today I will focus on these four powerhouses who have raised their hand to be Presidents' of the Global Women Leaders Committee Action Committees! Shelli Brunswick "Incubators/Accelerators Network" Deborah Walliser "Outstanding Female Leaders Competition" Gnoungo Mariam KONE "Global Fundraising Stage" Isabel Velarde "Gender Equality in Technology" Thank you to our Executive Chairman Baybars Altuntas for his continued vision and support! #down2bizlucychow #changingthegame_lucychow #changingthegame_future #WBAF #WomenInBusiness #FemaleEntrepreneurs #GlobalGrowth #Innovation #Partnerships #Incubators #Accelerators #GenderEquality #Entrepreneurship #EconomicDevelopment

Who has been tuning into the Olympics Paris 2024? Day 5 only and so much more excitement to come! It's timely that I share the work of COLLECTIVE VISIBILITY. The goal is to diversify speakers and thought leadership in sport. Join me and one thousand other women speaking about sport! This is a global talent movement in partnership with Center for Sports and Business at the Stockholm School of Economics. COLLECTIVE VISIBILITY continues growing! They are looking into going public with the directory, but in the meantime keep the signups coming. Let's reach more and more wonderful women speaking in sports. Fill in your details on this link: https://lnkd.in/gnTwBUA8 Thank you to Founder Vanessa Ã…SELL TSURUGA ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ª! #CollectiveVisibility #down2bizlucychow #changingthegame_lucychow #changingthegame_future #femalecommentators #womeninsports #womensports #sportsubjectmatterexperts #media

Inspiring, insightful and experienced. Meet the full jury of 'the mentl awards 2024' (possibly a couple more surprises to come). These awards are more than just a ceremony; they are a meaningful recognition of genuine merit. That is why they are judged by an independent jury of incredible leaders from diverse fields â€” including healthcare professionals, mental health champions, CEOs, academics and inspiring individualsâ€” our process ensures that each honour is earned solely on the basis of impactful contributions to mental health. Judges are from the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Oman, Qatar, plus international judges from the UK and Australia. From innovative initiatives in healthcare and finance to supportive environments in education and beyond, entries from all sectors across the GCC are welcomed. This is an opportunity to showcase your commitment to mental health and inspire others in your industry and community. It's time to hero the game-changers, the unsung champions, and the organizations that are making a real difference. Explore all the categories and criteria in depth here: https://lnkd.in/gY3tCwTt Honoured to be part of this incredible cohort of judges! Dr. Nahida Nayaz Ahmed Marwan Abdulaziz Janahi Dr. Khulood Alsayegh Muneer Alobeidli Dr AlSayyida Basma Al Said Ranim Kaddoura Kate Hardcastle MBE Azeem Rafiq Ahmad Imam Adel Alfalasi Dr. Vedrana Mladina Dr Brendon Stubbs Jessica Smith OAM PLY Mark Colbourne MBE Sarah Siyani Chartered FCIPD Geoff McDonald Noof Aljneibi , MAPP Toby Gregory Dr. Louise Lambert Mazen Nahawi Alex Malouf Dr. Naim Maadad Fazeela Gopalani Andrew Stotter-Brooks Chartered FCIPD Justin Kerr-Stevens Kate Midttun Sam Browning Emma Davies MCIPD Paul Firth FInstSMM Helen Farmer Sara Hedger #down2bizlucychow #changingthegame_future #changingthegame_lucychow #mentlawards #mentalhealth #wellbeingatwork #wellbeing #leadership #employeehappiness #hr #humanresources #talent #culture #GCC #UAE #saudiarabia #oman #kuwait #bahrain #qatar

Would you like to have a career conversation with an industry spearhead? Mentor Walks can make those connections happen where they bring together career-driven women like you with accomplished female mentors eager to share their knowledge and experiences. Whether you're joining for the first time or returning for more, each walk offers a chance to gain new insights and expand your network. Register for 5th September (Thursday) walk here: https://lnkd.in/gU-udAN6 What's in it for you? âœ… Insights from CEOs, directors, and industry trailblazers âœ… Practical tips for tackling career challenges âœ… Fresh perspectives to spark your professional growth ---------------------------- Criteria for Mentors: Mentor Walks mentors are very senior women from diverse professional and personal backgrounds who want to help women succeed. They are CEOs, VPs, directors, entrepreneurs and leaders in their fields, and generally have 20+ years senior experience in these key roles, managing people and leading teams. The program is high impact, low commitment. Walks start at 7:00am and finish at 8:30am and happen six times a year. The minimum commitment is to mentor at least once a year, if you can make more dates then even better, we make it as easy as possible for mentors to volunteer their time. If you are interested please email : dubai@mentorwalks.org How does it work? Mentees apply to come to a walk with an issue or topic they wish to discuss and we match them with the mentor best suited to help them at that walk. As a mentor, you will have up to three mentees in your group and you collectively discuss the issues as you walk. Importantly, there is no prep before each walk needed, no obligation for mentors to have ongoing contact with mentees after the walk and it's not time intensive; allowing you to turn up on the morning, be welcomed and matched by the Dubai local team, then exercise while mentoring the next generation of female leaders in the UAE! Sign up to be a mentor, or mentee! I hope to see you September 5th! #down2bizlucychow #changingthegame_lucychow #changingthegame_future #mentors #mentees #careeradvice #careerdevelopment #uae #dubai

A unique career opportunity! Application deadline is August 2nd, 2024. Are you a professional who wants to prepare students to adapt and contribute in a rapidly changing world? Are you someone who has a track record being a driving force for innovation and change in either the private, or public sector? American School of Dubai is seeking a dynamic and visionary leader to serve as the Director of the Center for Design & Innovation for Public Purpose. The newly established Center is inspired by the ASD Community and our desire to provide ASD students with additional applied learning experiences. Initially, the Center will focus on Grades 6â€“12. The Director will play a pivotal role in shaping the Center's mission, developing strategic partnerships, and fostering a culture of innovation and social impact within the community. Applications for this position will be handled by International Schools Services (ISS). Please apply through the link below. Or forward this position to someone who may be an ideal fit. https://lnkd.in/gJyeMQmG Photos Below: Advisory Committee meeting (Center for Design & Innovation for Public Purpose)comprised of distinguished industry leaders. #down2bizlucychow #changingthegame_future #changingthegame_lucychow #education #futurefocused #privateeducation #nonprofitschool #globaleducationleader #leadersoftomorrow #Dubai #UAE
